query.mssql: CREATE Table {0} ([ReportSessionId] [varchar](256) NOT NULL, [GroupName] [varchar](50) NULL, [ObjectName] [varchar](max) NULL, [EventName] [varchar](max) NULL, [ActionName] [varchar](50) NULL, [CompanyCode] [varchar](50) NULL)
query.postgres: CREATE Table {0} (ReportSessionId varchar(256) NOT NULL, GroupName citext, ObjectName citext, EventName citext, ActionName citext, CompanyCode citext)

query.default: Select GroupName, ObjectName, EventName, ActionName, CompanyCode FROM Auxo_ReportChanges Where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
Select DISTINCT CompanyCode FROM Auxo_ReportChanges Where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
